item.title: Linux Luminarium (pwn.college)
item.description: Linux Luminarium As agreed, I would not be doing any write-ups for pwn.college because that’s against the ground rules for their generously offered free educational material. That being said, I do want to keep record of the core skills I’ve gained through each section of their course in such a way that the notes won’t take away from the challenges - because it’s in the struggling that learning really happens.

item.title: Civic Data Challenge (Open Data Syracuse pt. 1)
